text:
EnergySavvy | Seattle | Onsite DevOps/Developer

EnergySavvy is an energy efficiency software company looking to add a key developers and a devops engineers to our team.

We use: Django, Python, React, Mercurial, PostgreSQL & more

If you like modern web technologies, like challenging technical problems and are interested in doing something that makes an impact, contact christine@energysavvy.com

If this sounds like you, check out the full job descriptions here: http://www.energysavvy.com/careers/
